<ProteomeCommons.org>
  <Project
    name="ProteomeCommons IO"
    version="2.0">
    <Author id="jfalkner@umich.edu"/>
    <Description>An open-source framework for manipulating spectra and peak lists. This framework works with many different formats including popular formats such as Mascot Generic Format and Sequest's DTA format.</Description>

    <Link type="Java API Documentation" url="docs/api/index.html"/>
